video.title: Classic Doctor Who
video.synopsis: These early seasons of the show follow the Doctor and his companions, who travel through time and space in a miraculous police box called the TARDIS.

episodes.synopsis: The TARDIS lands inside an Aztec temple in 15th Century Mexico and the travelers become cut off from the ship when they leave the temple to explore.
episodes.title: The Aztecs: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The High Priest of Sacrifice, Tlotoxl begins to doubt Barbara's claim to be the reincarnation of Yetaxa and plots to undermine her position.
episodes.title: The Aztecs: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor and Ian attempt to find a way back to the TARDIS. Barbara attempts to distract Tlotoxl but she already has plans for Susan.
episodes.title: The Aztecs: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Tlotoxl is set to make his move and have Barbara, the Doctor, Ian and Susan killed. Ian prepares for a fight to the death with the warrior, Ixta.
episodes.title: The Aztecs: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: To escape their destruction, the Doctor removes the TARDIS from normal space and time. The travelers are then lured out of the ship into a white void.
episodes.title: The Mind Robber: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor searches for his companions in a forest of words. Clockwork soldiers are on the prowl, and fictional characters come to life.
episodes.title: The Mind Robber: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With Rapunzel's help, Jamie escapes into the Citadel, where he makes a discovery. The Doctor and Zoe are confronted by a mythological minotaur.
episodes.title: The Mind Robber: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe are all captured by the White Robots in the Citadel and are taken to meet the Master of the Land of Fiction.
episodes.title: The Mind Robber: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor battles with the Master, both summoning characters from fiction to fight each other. If the Doctor loses, he'll be trapped forever.
episodes.title: The Mind Robber: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: The TARDIS takes the newly regenerated Doctor to Earth to begin his exile. Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart leads an investigation into a meteor shower.
episodes.title: Spearhead from Space: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: A recovered Doctor escapes the hospital and joins UNIT in their investigation. Channing directs one of his Auton servants to recover a meteorite.
episodes.title: Spearhead from Space: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sam Seeley has found one of the meteorites but the Autons want it back and are closing in. Meanwhile, General Scobie visits Auto Plastics.
episodes.title: Spearhead from Space: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The invasion begins as Auton shop dummies come to life and attack the public. The Doctor and UNIT infiltrate Auto Plastics.
episodes.title: Spearhead from Space: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: In search of the Doctor, an antimatter creature attacks UNIT. The Doctor is forced to send an SOS to the Time Lords, but they have their own troubles.
episodes.title: The Three Doctors: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Following the advice of the First Doctor, the Third Doctor and Jo have crossed through the black hole to the strange, desolate world of antimatter.
episodes.title: The Three Doctors: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Doctors are trapped in the universe of antimatter, where they confront the creator of the world, Omega, a legendary figure from Time Lord history.
episodes.title: The Three Doctors: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Omega intends to escape his antimatter world and needs the Doctors to take his place. But the Doctors discover the terrible truth about Omega.
episodes.title: The Three Doctors: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor and Jo arrive in 1926 on the cargo ship SS Bernice. But the TARDIS is taken by a giant hand and a dinosaur appears.
episodes.title: The Carnival of Monsters: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor and Jo have been miniaturized and trapped inside a Miniscope. The Scope has been impounded on the planet Inter Minor and may be destroyed.
episodes.title: The Carnival of Monsters: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Drashigs are pursuing Jo and the Doctor through the Miniscope. On Inter Minor, scheming bureaucrats intend to release the Drashigs.
episodes.title: The Carnival of Monsters: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor is desperate to save Jo and everyone trapped inside the Miniscope, but is hindered by the Inter Minorans who have their own agenda.
episodes.title: The Carnival of Monsters: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: UNIT is sent to investigate the death of a miner whose body has developed a strange green glow, while Jo joins a group of anti-pollution protesters.
episodes.title: The Green Death: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jo gets trapped in a mine shaft and discovers another miner with the glow. The Doctor learns that the mine cage that Jo was using had been sabotaged.
episodes.title: The Green Death: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor finds Jo at the entrance to a nest of giant green maggots deep within the mine, but the staff at Global Chemicals are behaving oddly.
episodes.title: The Green Death: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: When a maggot hatches and attacks Stevens's henchman, the Doctor is able to examine a sample of its cells. The Brigadier prepares to blow up the mine.
episodes.title: The Green Death: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: As Jo sets off to capture one of the maggots, the Doctor faces the brainwashing power of the computer that is really in control of Global Chemicals.
episodes.title: The Green Death: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: Jones is struck with the deadly virus, and the Doctor uses the Metebelis crystal to break the computer's hold over Stevens. Can the Doctor save Jones?
episodes.title: The Green Death: Part 6

episodes.synopsis: The TARDIS arrives in the future, on a space station where mankind is in hibernation. Sarah is accidentally placed in suspended animation.
episodes.title: The Ark in Space: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When the Doctor restores the power to the Ark, the humans begin to revive. But the station has been invaded by the giant insectoid Wirrn.
episodes.title: The Ark in Space: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor subjects himself to a dangerous experiment so he can access the memories of the dead Wirrn Queen. Elsewhere, the larvae Wirrn are pupating.
episodes.title: The Ark in Space: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The mutated Noah has now fully transformed into a Wirrn adult and intends to allow the Wirrn to devour the sleeping humans, absorbing their memories.
episodes.title: The Ark in Space: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: The TARDIS lands in 1911. Egyptian mummies are walking, and the Doctor and Sarah discover that an ancient and powerful evil is manifesting itself.
episodes.title: Pyramids of Mars: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor, Sarah and Laurence Scarman are being hunted down by Sutekh's robot mummies. The Doctor has a plan to disrupt Sutekh's control signal.
episodes.title: Pyramids of Mars: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The mummies are building a rocket to fire at the pyramid on Mars, which will release Sutekh. The Doctor is determined to destroy the rocket.
episodes.title: Pyramids of Mars: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Inside the pyramid on Mars, the Doctor and Sarah must solve puzzles and escape traps to prevent Sutekh's release from his imprisonment.
episodes.title: Pyramids of Mars: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: At the turn of the 20th century, the Tardis lands on Fang Rock island, where an alien menace may be to blame for the death of a lighthouse keeper.
episodes.title: Horror of Fang Rock: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The shaken survivors of a shipwreck take shelter in the lighthouse, but all are in deadly peril from the alien menace stalking the island.
episodes.title: Horror of Fang Rock: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor seals the survivors inside the lighthouse but discovers that he may unwittingly have trapped the creature inside with them.
episodes.title: Horror of Fang Rock: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: As the alien Rutan picks off the remaining humans, the Doctor devises a plan to defeat the invader and repel the approaching Rutan mother ship.
episodes.title: Horror of Fang Rock: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: On a mission to collect the six segments of the Key to Time, the Doctor and Romana travel to the planet Ribos and face the monstrous Shrivenzale.
episodes.title: The Ribos Operation: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Garrons attempts to trick the Graff Vynda-K into buying Ribos, but the jethrik that's vital to the plan is really the first piece of the Key to Time.
episodes.title: The Ribos Operation: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor and Romana's search for the first segment of the Key to Time is hampered when the Graff Vynda-K takes them prisoner.
episodes.title: The Ribos Operation: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Pursued into the catacombs by the Graff, the Doctor and Romana struggle to stay alive and find the first segment of the Key to Time.
episodes.title: The Ribos Operation: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: In search of the second segment of the Key to Time, the Doctor and Romana travel to Calufrax, but find a completely different planet is in its place.
episodes.title: The Pirate Planet: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In search of the missing planet, Calufrax, the Doctor and Romana encounter the telepathic Mentiads and Zanak's ruler, who is half-man, half-robot.
episodes.title: The Pirate Planet: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor learns the sinister truth about Zanak and solves the mystery of the missing planet. On the Bridge, the Doctor meets Zanak's real ruler.
episodes.title: The Pirate Planet: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor and Romana join forces with the Mentiads to prevent the Captain and Xanxia from using Zanak to consume the Earth.
episodes.title: The Pirate Planet: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Arriving on Tara, Romana locates the fourth segment of the Key to Time with ease, but is captured by the scheming Count Grendel.
episodes.title: The Androids of Tara: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Grendel kidnaps Reynart and seems set to be chosen as Tara's monarch when he fails to arrive at his coronation. But the Doctor has other plans.
episodes.title: The Androids of Tara: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While Romana makes her escape from the castle, the Doctor is lured to a meeting with an android duplicate of her that is programmed to kill him.
episodes.title: The Androids of Tara: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor attempts to gain entry to the castle to prevent the marriage of Romana to Prince Reynart and thwart Grendal's plans to rule Tara.
episodes.title: The Androids of Tara: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Tracing the Key's fifth segment to the third moon of Delta Magna, the Doctor and Romana are soon caught up in a conflict between humans and Swampies.
episodes.title: The Power of Kroll: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor arrives in time to save Romana from being sacrificed to the bogus god Kroll. But it isn't long before the real Kroll makes an appearance.
episodes.title: The Power of Kroll: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With the giant, squid-like Kroll awake and angry, the Swampies are eager to appease their god by using the Doctor and Romana as sacrificial victims.
episodes.title: The Power of Kroll: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor and Romana are appalled to discover that Thawn intends to fire a rocket at Kroll, which will also kill the Swampies.
episodes.title: The Power of Kroll: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: While on vacation in Paris, the Doctor and Romana experience a time distortion.
episodes.title: The City of Death: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor and Romana become the reluctant guests of Scarlioni, who is planning to steal the Mona Lisa.
episodes.title: The City of Death: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Count Scarlioni is revealed to really be Scaroth, last of the Jagaroth and is funding the construction of a time machine, but for what purpose?
episodes.title: The City of Death: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Scaroth intends to travel back in time to save his own people from destruction, but the Doctor can't allow him to succeed.
episodes.title: The City of Death: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: The Doctor and Romana visit the Leisure Hive on Argolis, where the Argolin, survivors of a war, run the Hive as a tourist attraction.
episodes.title: The Leisure Hive: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Tachyon Recreation Generator is the cause of the deaths at the Leisure Hive. Romana makes repairs, and the Doctor becomes a reluctant guinea pig.
episodes.title: The Leisure Hive: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Tachyon Generator has aged the Doctor into an old man, but he finds the truth behind the machine and uncovers a plot to take control of the Hive.
episodes.title: The Leisure Hive: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The obsessed Pangol is determined to give Argolis a future with himself as the leader of the reborn race and plans to strike back at the Foamasi.
episodes.title: The Leisure Hive: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: The TARDIS lands in 17th-century England, which is being stalked by a robotic death-like figure from behind a holographic wall.
episodes.title: The Visitation: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: A Terileptil is living in Sir John's basement and plans to wipe out mankind with plague rats. It decides to have the Doctor and Richard Mace beheaded.
episodes.title: The Visitation: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Nyssa and Adric are chased by the Android, and they head for safety on the TARDIS while Tegan prepares to unleash rats on the Doctor and Richard Mace.
episodes.title: The Visitation: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Heading to London Town, the Doctor discovers more Terileptils in hiding. Forced to find a way to stop them, their soliton gas generator explodes.
episodes.title: The Visitation: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Gunrunners are on Androzani Minor, supplying the rebellious android-builder Sharez Jek with munitions to help his attempts to return to power.
episodes.title: The Caves of Androzani: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Military captive Salateen tells Peri and the Doctor they are dying from spectrox tomaemia and the only cure is the milk of the queen bat.
episodes.title: The Caves of Androzani: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As Morgus continues to plot his political future on Androzani Major, Sharez Jek insanely believes Peri will fall in love with him.
episodes.title: The Caves of Androzani: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Morgus is ruined, exposed as the one funding Jek's gunrunners, and Jek himself goes on a murderous rampage.
episodes.title: The Caves of Androzani: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: As Russian forces approach England, an ancient evil stirs beneath the water's surface. For Ace and the Doctor, a deadly game of revenge has begun.
episodes.title: The Curse of Fenric: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Viking runes in the crypt contain a secret to Ace's past, while the Ultima machine offers to break the chains of the Wolves of Fenric.
episodes.title: The Curse of Fenric: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Haemovores attack St. Jude's church, and the insane Millington willingly sacrifices his men. Dr. Judson dies, only to be reborn.
episodes.title: The Curse of Fenric: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Ancient Haemovore stands upon the Earth once again, determined to change the future by erasing the past and Ace finally feels love for her mother.
episodes.title: The Curse of Fenric: Part 4
